title: What do I build on my Shenpai now
body: Just a Shen main here, ever since the changes to sunfire it just feels awkward to play him now. I have tried coming up with new items to start with instead but haven't found anything that works. So I gave up and am looking to try again. Anyone have any ideas? I need HALP. Make  {{champion:98}} great again

replies.body:
{{item:3077}} rush for lane, helps alot in trades and adds the waveclear that sunfire would give and upgradeing it to titanic at some point further helps your damage and waveclear.

Vs magic damage(like rumble), {{item:3091}} rush can be supprisingly strong on him

Join the Top lane tanks club and build {{item:3748}} {{item:3190}} {{item:3109}} {{item:3111}}  and then a choice of {{item:3742}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3193}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3194}} {{item:3001}} to round off the build
RIP sunfire. I have build Locket on Shen a lot before but never thought of vow. But I guess thats a thing now on top laners. My guess is vow is gonna get hit soon though

Maybe... maybe not... my guesstimation would be that Riot would anticipate the top lane migration to the soon to be reworked thornmail with the new grievous wounds passive it would have. Either way, until then may as well take advantage

On hit/attack spee mid/top like guinsoos nashors wits end blade items like those and then one item like spirit visage frozen fist tri force and boots

Not that order just listing items ofc adjust order and items by matchup

well i mean, you could go the build thats used the most on him now.

Follows the lines of titanic into gargoyle plate from what i see unless you're against an ap champ
